name: Asteroids Space Shooter
description:
Welcome to Asteroids!

You have been tasked to guard the mothership from an incoming attack of asteroids, bombs, and alien spacecrafts. Blast your way through 10 waves of spectacular dodging and shooting, while picking up powerups and credits to aid you in your mission. Unlock new ships, fight your way through all 10 waves, and blast yourself to victory!

Gameplay

  • Use arrow keys to move left and right
  • Press spacebar to fire bullets
  • Shoot as many enemies as possible
  • Prevent Breach Alerts by shooting down enough enemies
  • Pickup powerups for temporary special abilities
  • Collect credits over time to unlock new ship skins

Credits & Ships

Credits are collected by shooting Golden Asteroids and are used to purchase new ships in the Appearance menu. Higher waves reward you with more credits.

Exciting enemies

While progressing through the waves you'll encounter new dangerous enemies, such as rigged asteroids, energy ships, and more! Each enemy has it's own set of attacks and abilities, so stay alert!
